Class PBEFileEncrypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • prng.utilities.PBEFileEncrypt

  • public class PBEFileEncrypt
extends Object
    Utility to encrypt a set of files using PBE.

    Simon Greatrix

      • storeMeta

        void storeMeta(JarOutputStream jarOutput,
               int id,
               PBEItem outer,
               PBEItem[] items)
        throws IOException,
               GeneralSecurityException
        Store a set of meta information in the JAR
        Parameters:
        jarOutput - the jar
        id - the id of the meta information
        outer - the meta information on the meta information (if any)
        items - the meta information
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O failure occurs
        GeneralSecurityException - if a cryptographic failure occurs
